## Core.Ids.normalize() function

Normalizes a supplied `string`<!-- -->, removing non-alphanumeric characters and forcing to lower case.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function normalize(from: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  from | string | the <code>string</code> to be normalized |

**Returns:**

string
